name: UtilityInsecurityScreeningAssessmentsAndQuestions
title: Utility Insecurity Screening Assessments And Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments and questions for Utility Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessments or questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses  for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments and questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

contains.display: Protocol for Responding to and Assessing Patients' Assets, Risks, and Experiences [PRAPARE]
Have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed in past 1 year [PRAPARE]
At risk of having utilities shut off in the next week Caregiver
Trouble paying heating bill AndOr electricity bill Caregiver
Would like help with paying heating AndOr electricity bill Caregiver
Accountable health communities (AHC) health-related social needs screening (HRSN) tool
Has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home in past 12 months
American Academy of Family Physicians Social Needs Screening Tool
American Academy of Family Physicians Social Needs Screening Tool - short form
